content: purchasable pdf pattern https //www etsy com/listing/615094555/crochet-petal-stitch-baby-blanket youtube tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=qbetaiwsg7w materials * bernat baby sport yarn in peach blossom baby grey and white these particular skeins they sent me were jumbo 1200 yards of yarn one each was plenty but if you are buying smaller regular size buy two of each color * size g hook * scissors * tapestry needle to weave in the ends * fabric softener the yarn needs to be softened up a bit after you are finished
